familyMemberEthics.description: Former member/president of Wollman Rink Operations LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned 9255614 in ice skating rink operation income from Wollman Rink Operations LLC, valued at $1,000,001 - $5,000,000. Underlying Assets: operating agreement with NEW YORK CITY DEPARTMENT OF PARKS & RECREATION - ice skating rinks. Location: New York, NY. See attached schedule.
